com.github.crashdemons.mobeggdrops.api

Interface MobEggDropsAPI


  • public interface MobEggDropsAPI
    Interface for the PlayerHeads API. This interface defines each method that the PlayerHeads API provides.
    Author:
    crashdemons (crashenator at gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getEggDrop(org.bukkit.entity.Entity e)
      Gets a stack of head items as they would normally be dropped from the given entity.
      @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getEggItem(EggType h, int num)
      Gets a stack of head items for the given type and amount.
      @Nullable EggType getEggOf(org.bukkit.entity.Entity e)
      Gets the type of head associated with an entity
      @Nullable EggType getEggOf(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType t)
      Deprecated. 
      this may not do exactly what you want because between MC 1.10-1.13 many entities were separated from variants to their own entity-type. Using this method will introduce version-dependent behavior (For example: this may not be able to tell a stray from a skeleton in certain server versions) and should be avoided by using getEggFrom(Entity) instead.
      @NotNull MobEggDropsPlugin getPlugin()
      Get the main PlayerHeads Plugin instance
      @NotNull String getVersion()
      Get the version of the PlayerHeads plugin in use

    • Method Detail

      • getPlugin

        @NotNull
@NotNull MobEggDropsPlugin getPlugin()
        Get the main PlayerHeads Plugin instance
        Returns:
        the PlayerHeads plugin object, or null if unavailable.

      • getVersion

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getVersion()
        Get the version of the PlayerHeads plugin in use
        Returns:
        the version of the PlayerHeads plugin in use

      • getEggOf

        @Nullable
@Nullable EggType getEggOf(org.bukkit.entity.Entity e)
        Gets the type of head associated with an entity
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to check
        Returns:
        the type of head, or null if there is no viable head.

      • getEggOf

        @Nullable
@Nullable EggType getEggOf(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType t)
        Deprecated. this may not do exactly what you want because between MC 1.10-1.13 many entities were separated from variants to their own entity-type. Using this method will introduce version-dependent behavior (For example: this may not be able to tell a stray from a skeleton in certain server versions) and should be avoided by using getEggFrom(Entity) instead.
        Gets the type of head associated with an entity-type. See deprecation note for limitations.
        Parameters:
        t - the entity type to check
        Returns:
        the type of head, or null if there is no viable head.
        See Also:
        getEggDrop(org.bukkit.entity.Entity)

      • getEggItem

        @NotNull
@NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getEggItem(EggType h,
                                                             int num)
        Gets a stack of head items for the given type and amount. Note: player-type heads will be untextured and have no set owner with this method.
        Parameters:
        h - the head type to create items of
        num - the number of items to create
        Returns:
        The item stack

      • getEggDrop

        org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getEggDrop(org.bukkit.entity.Entity e)
        Gets a stack of head items as they would normally be dropped from the given entity. Note: this method takes into full account plugin configuration settings, player's name, and preset item drop amount
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to create items from
        Returns:
        The item stack
